Post-Match Reflections: 'Would've been best for us if I stayed there till the end': Shubman Gill
Others: India chose to field a young side, handing three debut caps - Abhishek Sharma, Riyan Parag and Dhruv Jurel and the trio have a forgettable match with the bat
Shubman Gill put up a fight but was outfoxed by Sikandar Raza on a good delivery
Washington Sundar kept India alive in the game till the final over but it was just too late for the World Champions
